de.jugs.cookbook
Class Session

java.lang.Object
  de.must.markup.SessionStd
      de.jugs.cookbook.Session

public final class Session
extends SessionStd

Session class. Assigned by class Main. This is a place to define the look and feel for the sessions in general. For example, different sessions may user different layouts.
